content: this simple pattern is suitable for those who are completely new to **tunisian crochet** but assumes familiarity with the basics of regular crochet tunisian **simple** and **purl** stitches are alternated to create the **honeycomb** stitch a dense and textured fabric which does not curl on the edges instructions are given to make either a napkin fingering weight or a dishcloth worsted weight in this beautiful stitch you will need a tunisian crochet hook and 100% cotton yarn there are links in the pattern to instructional videos for both beginners and those who simply need a quick demonstration of purl stitch these dishcloths and napkins are a great beginner project and you will be a master of tunisian purl stitch by the end
